TEI.2: California Riparian Systems: Ecology, Conservation, and Productive Management Richard E. Warner and Kathleen M. Hendrix, editors Environmental Studies California and the West This volume presents 135 of the papers presented at the 1981 California Riparian Systems Conference. The papers address all aspects of riparian systems: habitat, wildlife, land management, land use policy planning, conservation and water resource management. 19841203 text http://ark.cdlib.org/ark:/13030/ft1c6003wp http://www.ucpress.edu/ http://escholarship.cdlib.org/ Public X X X
